chunk:
patricksmithbotanicals Balance & Repair Serum

Brand: Patrick Smith Botanicals

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Prunus armeniaca (Apricot) kernel oil*, Argania spinosa (Argan) oil*, Rosa rubiginosa (Rosehip) seed oil*, Triticum vulgare (Wheat Germ) oil, Rosa damascena (Rose) flower oil*, Pelargonium x asperum (Geranium) flower oil*, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) flower oil*, Citrus aurantium (Neroli) oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E).
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
